# Tables

## Simple Table

| Name | Age | City |
|------|-----|------|
| Alice | 30 | NYC |
| Bob | 25 | LA |
| Charlie | 35 | SF |

## Table with Alignment

| Left | Center | Right |
|:-----|:------:|------:|
| A | B | C |
| Foo | Bar | Baz |
| 1 | 2 | 3 |

## Table with Inline Formatting

| Feature | Status | Notes |
|---------|--------|-------|
| **Bold** | *Italic* | `Code` |
| [Link](https://example.com) | ~~Strike~~ | Plain |
